verbose_text: Next, we studied the PK and biodistribution of No peptide, NCP, and PTP liposomes (1 mg of lipid) in SKOV3 and OVCAR8 subcutaneous tumor models using fluorescence molecular tomography (FMT), which, due to the presence of DiR (a lipophilic, near-IR dye) in the lipid bilayer of liposomes, allowed PK analysis through non invasive serial imaging XREF_BIBR.
